item.title: Dragon claws error
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

im trying to add dragon claws hit 4 times in (317)

i got this error

client.java:18367: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable DCSDamg
location: class client
if ((IsAttackingNPC) && DCSDamg == true && DCStimer == 0) {
^
client.java:18415: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable specialTimer
location: class client
if (specialAmount <= 99 && specialTimer <= 0) {
^
client.java:18417: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable specialTimer
location: class client
specialTimer = 4;
^
client.java:18425: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable specialTimer
location: class client
specialTimer -= 1;
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
4 errors
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .

its the same with dds just trying to make it hit 2 more times

heres the code i made. its made from thee dds one only then i messed around with it

    if ((IsAttackingNPC) && DCSDamg == true && DCStimer == 0) {
        SpecDamgNPC(25);
        DCS2Damg = false;
    }
    if (IsAttacking == true && DCS2Damg == true && DCStimer == 0) {
        SpecDamg(25);
        DCS2Damg = false;
    }
    if ((IsAttackingNPC) && DCS3Damg == true && DCStimer == 0) {
        SpecDamgNPC(25);
        DCS3Damg = false;
    }
    if (IsAttacking == true && DCS4Damg == true && DCStimer == 0) {
        SpecDamg(25);
        DCS4Damg = false;
    }

    if (DCStimer > 0) {
        DCStimer -= 1;
    }

    if (SpecialDelay <= 9) {
        SpecDelay++;
    }
    if (SpecTimer == 25) {
        SpecialTimer++;
    }
    if (SpecTimer == 50) {
        SpecialTimer++;
    }
    if (SpecTimer == 75) {
        SpecialTimer++;
        SpecTimer = 0;
    }

    if (strDelay <= 9) {
        strDelay++;
    }
    if (strDelay <= 25) {
        strDelay++;
    }
    if (strDelay <= 50) {
        strDelay++;
    }
    if (strDelay == 75) {
        strDelay = 0;
    }

    if (specialAmount <= 99 && specialTimer <= 0) {
        specialAmount += 1;
        specialTimer = 4;
        specialAttacks();
        specialAttacks2();
        specialAttacks3();
        specialAttacks4();
        specialAttacks5();
        specialAttacks6();
    }
    specialTimer -= 1;
    l33thax(12323);
    l33thax(7574);
    l33thax(7599);
    l33thax(7549);
    l33thax(8493);
    l33thax(7499);

    if (strAmount <= 99 && strDelay <= 0) {
        strAmount += 1;
        strDelay = 4;
    }
    if (actionAmount < 0) {
        actionAmount = 0;
    }
    if (actionTimer > 0) {
        actionTimer -= 1;
    }
    if (actionTimer > 0) {
        actionTimer -= 1;
    }
    if (actionTimer > 0) {
        actionTimer -= 1;
    }

and this code
